meanings.definition: The state or quality of being infrequent.
meanings.sent1: The infrequency of his visits made us miss him more.
meanings.sent2: The infrequency of shooting stars makes them special to see.
meanings.sent3: The infrequency of sunny days in winter always surprises me.
meanings.sent4: The infrequency of her laughter was like a rare gem in a sea of silence.
meanings.sent5: The infrequency of snow in our town made the winter seem shorter.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being rare or uncommon.
meanings.sent1: The infrequency of blue moons adds to their mystique.
meanings.sent2: The infrequency of solar eclipses makes them a spectacle to behold.
meanings.sent3: The infrequency of finding a four-leaf clover brings luck to those who do.
meanings.sent4: The infrequency of her smiles was like finding a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The infrequency of shooting stars makes each sighting magical.
